disclosures.details: Vacant block at Rosedale, Victoria. Investment.
Unknown activities of company
Research
Education
Education
Credit Cards
Savings & Investment
A small honorarium as Editor of a Magazine, income as a Marriage Educator

I do not believe that either I, or my wife, or dependent children belong to any organisation from which a conflict of interest arises - or could be seen to arise. However, for the sake of transparency, I attach a list of organizations to which we belong.
Not to my knowledge or belief.
My wife and I attended the AFL preliminary final & grand final as guests of Dansu Constructions.

House of Representatives; Federal Executive Council; Liberal Party, Victorian Division, Eaglemont Branch; Federal Parliamentary Liberal Party; Marriage Education Programme Inc.; Marriage and Relationships Educators Association of Australia; National Association of Australian University Colleges (Life Member); Newman Old Collegians' Association; St John's Parish, Heidelberg; Equestrian Order of the Holy Sepulcher; St Michael Research Foundation; Newman College Council and related entities; various Parliamentary friendship groups; Victorian Bar (Non-practicing); Australian Catholic Bishops Conference Council for the Family; Veneto Club (Honorary); Hon Advisor (Patron), Life Decisions International; Pontifical Council for the Family (Consultor/Advisor); Ong Chen Run Charity Art Foundation (Patron);
My wife and I were upgraded to business class by Qantas on a flight from Australia to London in December 2010
We participated in the Australia Israel Leadership Forum in Israel as guests
We visited the Kingdom of Morocco for four days as guests
We attended the Cancer Council Classic and the Legends Dinner during the Tour Down Under as guests
I took up the complimentary offer that Astra extended to Members of Parliament to have Foxtel installed in my electorate office.
My wife and I have purchased a residential block at Kilmore for investment purposes. A house is being constructed on it. We have loans with Westpac and Rhymney Pty Ltd for this purpose.
We attended the AFL Carlton-Essendon final and the AFL Grand Final as guests of the Dansu Group.
We attended a reception and screening of "The Matchmaker" for the opening of the Israeli Film Festival in Melbourne.
We attended a reception hosted by the Victorian government to celebrate Cadel Evans' victory in the Tour de France.
We attended a lunch as guests of the St Vincent's Institute.
I attended (and spoke at) a dinner to celebrate Indian Independence Day as a guest of the Federation of Indian Associations.
I have received legal advice from Minter Ellison for which the firm waived the fees.
I have received various small gifts from organisers of functions at which I have spoken, such as Moon Cakes, and bottles of wine.
I participated in an international conference on families in Rome as a guest.
I participated in the Australia-Israel-UK Leadership Forum in Israel as a guest
I attend the 5th stage of the Tour Down Under and the Legends Dinner as a guest of Santos
My wife and I attended the Western Bulldogs match in the opening AFL round as guests.
I am now a member of the Southern Masters Cycling Club.
I was a guest of VECCI at the VECCI Top 200 AFL Grand Final lunch and AFL Grand Final at the MCG on Saturday 29 September 2012
I received two tickets and hospitality at the Cox Plate as a guest of Sportingbet on 27 October 2012.
I attended stages of the Tour Down Under as a guest.
My wife and I attended two nights of the Australian Open Tennis Championships as guests.
I received three nights' accommodation in London as a participant in the annual Australia-Israel-UK dialogue.
I received a complementary membership renewal.
